languages.text: "Это даже не смешно. Друкари прихлопнут вас, как только вы доставите им мельчайшее неудобство".
"This is a farce. The Drukhari will swat you like flies the moment you cause them the slightest inconvenience."
languages.original_text: "Это даже не смешно. Друкари прихлопнут вас, как только вы доставите им мельчайшее неудобство".

traits.locale_text: "This is a farce. The Drukhari will swat you like flies the moment you cause them the slightest inconvenience."

"This is a farce. The Drukhari will swat you like flies the moment you cause them the slightest inconvenience."

languages.text: “这简直是场闹剧。只要你给黑暗灵族带来了一丝不便，他们就会像拍苍蝇一样把你拍死。”
languages.original_text: "This is a farce. The Drukhari will swat you like flies the moment you cause them the slightest inconvenience."

traits.locale_text: “这简直是场闹剧。只要你给黑暗灵族带来了一丝不便，他们就会像拍苍蝇一样把你拍死。”

languages.text: 「嘘だ。デュカーリは少しでも邪魔する者に対して容赦ない…ハエは叩き落とすはずだ」
languages.original_text: "This is a farce. The Drukhari will swat you like flies the moment you cause them the slightest inconvenience."

traits.locale_text: 「嘘だ。デュカーリは少しでも邪魔する者に対して容赦ない…ハエは叩き落とすはずだ」

languages.text: «Esto es una farsa. Los Drukhari los aplastarán como moscas en cuanto les causen el más mínimo inconveniente».
languages.original_text: "This is a farce. The Drukhari will swat you like flies the moment you cause them the slightest inconvenience."

traits.locale_text: «Esto es una farsa. Los Drukhari los aplastarán como moscas en cuanto les causen el más mínimo inconveniente».

languages.text: « Ce n'est qu'une mascarade. Les Drukharis ne feront qu'une bouchée de vous dès que vous leur causerez le moindre désagrément. »
languages.original_text: "This is a farce. The Drukhari will swat you like flies the moment you cause them the slightest inconvenience."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est qu'une mascarade. Les Drukharis ne feront qu'une bouchée de vous dès que vous leur causerez le moindre désagrément. »

languages.text: "Das ist lächerlich. Die Drukhari werden Euch zerquetschen wie Fliegen, sobald Ihr ihnen die leisesten Unannehmlichkeiten bereitet."
languages.original_text: "This is a farce. The Drukhari will swat you like flies the moment you cause them the slightest inconvenience."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist lächerlich. Die Drukhari werden Euch zerquetschen wie Fliegen, sobald Ihr ihnen die leisesten Unannehmlichkeiten bereitet."

languages.text: "Tam bir saçmalık. Drukhariler, onlara verdiğin en küçük rahatsızlıkta seni bir sinek gibi ezecektir."
languages.original_text: "This is a farce. The Drukhari will swat you like flies the moment you cause them the slightest inconvenience."

traits.locale_text: "Tam bir saçmalık. Drukhariler, onlara verdiğin en küçük rahatsızlıkta seni bir sinek gibi ezecektir."
